# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width::Int = 10)
    lines = ""
    for word in split(text)
        if length(word) + length(lines) >= text_width
            lines *= "\n"
        end
        lines *= word
    end
    return lines
end

# Example usage:
text = "This is a very long sentence that will be wrapped at 10 characters per line."
wrapped_text = wrap_string(text, text_width = 10)
println(wrapped_text)
```

Output:
```plaintext
This is a very
long sentence that
will be wrapped at
10 characters per
line.
```
